dict.acceptation: 令人厌烦( bore的过去式和过去分词 )；挖；掘；钻；

sent.orig: Bored! How can you be bored? I was never bored at your age.
sent.trans: 无聊？你怎么可能觉得无聊？我跟你一样大的时候从来不觉得无聊。

sent.orig: Society is now one polished horde, form'd of two mighty tribes, the Bores and Bored.
sent.trans: 现在的社会是个经过琢磨的部落，由两大族群构成，使人厌者，和被人厌者。

sent.orig: She had been around and become very bored with life.
sent.trans: 她阅历甚广，已对人生感到厌倦。

sent.orig: On one side, bored-looking visitors watch an assortment of dance routines featuring performers in ethnic-minority costumes.
sent.trans: 一边是身着少数民族的特色服装的演员在跳舞，面带倦容的游客观看着舞蹈。

sent.orig: Several young girls were sitting around looking bored.
sent.trans: 有几个女孩儿没精打彩地随处坐着。
